summary: Tested scoring service module and Fan Scoring demo mode. All 42 unit tests pass. API endpoints verified via curl. Frontend Fan Demo Mode fully functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Scoring service module (scoring_service/core.py) is well-structured with clean separation of concerns
All 42 unit tests in test_scoring_service.py pass - covers delta calculation, round scoring, fight scoring, edge cases
API routes properly integrated - /api/scoring/config, /api/scoring/round, /api/scoring/calculate-delta all working
Fan Scoring Demo Mode uses MOCKED preset fights (not live backend data) - this is by design
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_scoring_api.py - Created API test file for scoring endpoints

success_rate.backend: 100% (42/42 unit tests passed, 3 API endpoints verified)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Scoring service refactor complete and tested. Unit tests in test_scoring_service.py (42 tests). API tests in test_scoring_api.py. Fan Demo Mode uses hardcoded preset fights - NOT connected to live backend.

api_scoring_config.returns: version 2.0, config with thresholds and event_points

api_scoring_round.returns: red_score, blue_score, winner, result, delta, breakdown

fan_demo_fight_card.description: UFC 300, McGregor vs Poirier displayed correctly

fan_demo_scoring_timer.description: 30s countdown timer with SCORING OPEN label
